config.script:
eqUUID = self.view.params.eqUUID
	currStateClassUUID = self.view.params.currStateClassUUID
	newStateClassUUID = self.view.params.newStateClassUUID
	
	eqObj = system.mes.loadMESObject(eqUUID)
	eqObj.setPropertyValue('EquipmentStateClassUUID', newStateClassUUID)
	system.mes.saveMESObject(eqObj)
	system.perspective.sendMessage('refresh', {})
	self.view.params.editState = False
	self.view.params.currStateClassUUID = ''

state = event.data['eqStateUUID']
	self.parent.getChild("editBar").getChild("info").custom.eqStateUUID = state
	if event.data['class']:
		self.view.params.newStateClassUUID = state
	else:
		self.view.params.newStateClassUUID = ''
	self.getSibling("newState").custom.relativeUUID = state
	
	self.getSibling("newStateClass").custom.relativeUUID = state

if self.view.params.newStateClassUUID == '':
		self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("newState").custom.new = False
		self.parent.parent.parent.parent.getChild("content").custom.newState = True
		selfUUID = self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("newState").custom.relativeUUID
		
		mesObject= system.mes.loadMESObject(selfUUID)
		code = mesObject.getStateCode()
		scope = mesObject.getStateOverrideScope()
		override = mesObject.getStateOverrideSetting()
		threshold = mesObject.getStateShortStopThreshold()
		type = mesObject.getStateTypeName()
		
		self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("newState").getChild("data").getChild("nameEntry").props.text = mesObject.getName()
		self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("newState").getChild("data").getChild("thresholdEntry").props.text = threshold
		self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("newState").getChild("data").getChild("codeEntry").props.value = code
		self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("newState").getChild("data").getChild("typeSelect").props.value = type
		self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("newState").getChild("data").getChild("scopeSelect").props.value = scope
		self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("newState").getChild("data").getChild("overrideSelect").props.value = override
	else:
		self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("newStateClass").custom.new = False
		
		self.parent.parent.parent.parent.getChild("content").custom.newStateClass = True
		selfUUID = self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("newState").custom.relativeUUID
				
		mesObject= system.mes.loadMESObject(selfUUID)
		self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("newStateClass").getChild("data").getChild("nameEntry").props.text = mesObject.getName()

props.text: Can't Delete Class, it is in use.

onChange.script:
instances = []
	if currentValue.value is not None and currentValue.value != '' and len(currentValue.value) > 0:
		mesUUID = currentValue.value
		mesObject = system.mes.loadMESObject(mesUUID)
		if mesObject.getMESObjectTypeName() == 'EquipmentState':
			
			dict = {}
			dict['title'] = 'Code:'
			dict['value'] = mesObject.getStateCode()
			instances.append(dict)
			dict = {}
			dict['title'] = 'Type:'
			dict['value'] = mesObject.getStateTypeName()
			instances.append(dict)
			dict = {}
			dict['title'] = 'Short Stop Threshold:'
			dict['value'] = mesObject.getStateShortStopThreshold()
			instances.append(dict)
			dict = {}
			dict['title'] = 'Override:'
			dict['value'] = mesObject.getStateOverrideSetting()
			instances.append(dict)
			dict = {}
			dict['title'] = 'Scope:'
			dict['value'] = mesObject.getStateOverrideScope()
			instances.append(dict)
		elif mesObject.getMESObjectTypeName() == 'EquipmentStateClass':
			dict = {}
			dict['title'] = 'Roles: '
			dict['value'] = str(mesObject.getPropertyValue('EquipmentStateClassSecurity'))
			instances.append(dict)
			
	
	self.props.instances = instances

config.script:
dataCtr = self.parent.parent.getChild("data")
	name = dataCtr.getChild("nameEntry").props.text
	code = dataCtr.getChild("codeEntry").props.value
	type = dataCtr.getChild("typeSelect").props.value
	override = dataCtr.getChild("overrideSelect").props.value
	scope = dataCtr.getChild("scopeSelect").props.value
	if self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("newState").custom.new:
		stateCls = system.mes.loadMESObject(self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("newState").custom.relativeUUID)
		#insert the name of your State Class here
		state = system.mes.createMESObject('EquipmentState')
		stateCls.addChild(state)
	else:
		stateCls = system.mes.loadMESObject(self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("newState").custom.parentUUID)
		state = system.mes.loadMESObject(self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("newState").custom.relativeUUID)
	state.setPropertyValue('Name', name)
	state.setPropertyValue('EquipmentStateCode', code)
	state.setPropertyValue('EquipmentStateType', type)
	#valid values for EquipmentStateType: "Running", "Idle", "Blocked", "Starved", "Planned Downtime", "Unplanned Downtime", "Disabled"
	state.setPropertyValue('EquipmentStateOverride', override)
	state.setPropertyValue('EquipmentStateOverrideScope', scope)
	
	if name != '':
		system.mes.saveMESObject(state)
	
		system.mes.saveMESObject(stateCls)
	
	
#	
		system.perspective.sendMessage('refresh', {})
		
		self.parent.parent.parent.parent.getChild("content").custom.newState = False

dataCtr = self.parent.parent.getChild("data")
	name = dataCtr.getChild("nameEntry").props.text
	
	if self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("newStateClass").custom.new:
		try:
			stateCls = system.mes.loadMESObject(self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("newStateClass").custom.parentUUID)
		except:
			stateCls = system.mes.loadMESObject('Equipment States','EquipmentStateRoot')
		#insert the name of your State Class here
		state = system.mes.createMESObject('EquipmentStateClass')
		stateCls.addChild(state)
	else:
		stateCls = system.mes.loadMESObject(self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("newStateClass").custom.parentUUID)
		state = system.mes.loadMESObject(self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("newStateClass").custom.relativeUUID)
	state.setPropertyValue('Name', name)
	
	
	if name != '':
		system.mes.saveMESObject(state)
	
		system.mes.saveMESObject(stateCls)
	
	
#	
		system.perspective.sendMessage('refresh', {})
		
		self.parent.parent.parent.parent.getChild("content").custom.newStateClass = False

onChange.script:
if currentValue.value is not None and currentValue.value != '':
		relativeUUID = currentValue.value
		obj = system.mes.loadMESObject(relativeUUID)
		type = obj.getMESObjectTypeName()
		
		
		def look(obj):
			list = obj.getParentCollection().getList()
			for item in list:
				
#				parentName = item.getName()
#				parentUUID = item.getMESObjectUUID()
				return item
				
		l = []
		def findAllParents(obj, l = l):
			list = obj.getParentCollection().getList()
			for item in list:
				
				parentName = item.getName()
				if parentName != 'Equipment States':
					l.append(item.getMESObject())
					findAllParents(item.getMESObject())
		#	return parentName
		
		if type == 'EquipmentState':
			item = look(obj)
			parentUUID = item.getMESObjectUUID()
			parentName = item.getName()
		else:
			parentName = obj.getName()
			parentUUID = relativeUUID
#		parentName = look(obj)
		
		self.custom.parent = parentName
		self.custom.parentUUID = parentUUID
	else:
		self.custom.parent = ''
		self.custom.parentUUID = ''
